meanings.definition: People who create compositions using photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photocomposers worked together to design a beautiful collage.
meanings.sent2: I admire the talent of photocomposers who can turn simple pictures into stunning artworks.
meanings.sent3: The photocomposers at the art show had everyone amazed by their creativity.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a group of photocomposers, arranging memories into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The photocomposers' creations were so lifelike, they seemed to jump off the page.

meanings.definition: Machines or software used to compose images using photographs.
meanings.sent1: The new photocomposers in the studio made editing photos much easier.
meanings.sent2: Photocomposers have revolutionized the way we manipulate images digitally.
meanings.sent3: The photocomposers on the computer were like little helpers fixing all the pictures.
meanings.sent4: The photocomposers transformed the raw images into a work of art with just a few clicks.
meanings.sent5: Using photocomposers, anyone can enhance their photos and make them look professional.
